text: Oh I see I can access URL parameters within Hubl, that's cool! <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/variables#http-request-variables>
Hi guys, I have a question about the blog listing. Can we add a teaser module to a blog post and show it in the blog listing instead of showing the content from post_body/post_list_content?

You can edit the blog-index page however you’d like with custom modules and all.

In addtion you can create your own module that loops blog posts from a specific blog and style it any way you’d want

Module has *overrideable=False* and this is what we see in the post editor. It doesn't make any change to the page, but it may be confusing for users. I believe only the alert should be there, like before.

Hi guys! by any chance, is the tag listing page affected by the post limit blog setting? I'm trying to add a pagination in tag listing page but seems like the tag listing is not affected by the post limit setting.
I believe pagination for tag listing pages should work the exact same as the main page? Just with the tag slug in the url
